title: Alg Out Ultra 60%
long_description: ALG OUT 60% destroys algae in pool water. Its highly concentrated formula makes it a powerful algaecide against visible algae. ALG OUT 60% treats a wide variety of algae (green, yellow and black).
short_description: BENEFIT Controls algae in pool water FORMATS 1 L and 4 L

characteristics.title: Application Method
characteristics.text: Pour ALG OUT ULTRA 60% into the water, all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add ALG OUT ULTRATM 60% according to the application method. Wait 5 minutes before bathing.

dosage.specifications: For visible algae, add 100 mL of ALG OUT ULTRA 60% per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: DO NOT apply the product when swimmers are in the pool.
